featured.text: Nothing much will change in the near future for them.
Everyone starts and ends the day by howling to check out where their nearest competitors are.
Children in this region often start running at an early age, covering great distances to fetch water and firewood or to reach the nearest school.
Rapid advancement in motor engineering makes it _____ possible to build a flying car in the near future.

definition.en_def: Close to something in distance or time.
definition.example: The store is near my house.
